name: 李俊賢
objective: Transfer function, transient response, equivalent systems, stability, forced response errors, root locus and controller design, frequency response, lag-lead compensation, and state space approach
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction (Ch. 1)
Week 2: Transfer function (Ch. 2)
Week 3-4: Transient response (Ch. 4)
Week 5: Equivalent systems (Ch. 5)
Week 6: Stability (Ch. 6)
Week 7-8: Forced response errors (Ch. 7)
Week 9: 複習與期中考
Week 10-12: Root locus and controller design (Ch. 8-9)
Week 13-14: Frequency response (Ch. 10)
Week 15-16: Lag-lead compensation (Ch. 11)
Week 17: State space approach (Ch. 3, 12)
Week 18: 複習與期末考
materials: Textbook: Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 5/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2008 (滄海圖書代理).
